task.title: Brushing your teeth
task.shortdesc: Something to do so your breath doesn't stink.

taskbody.context: You'll need a toothbrush, toothpaste and a sink.

step.cmd: Pick up your toothbrush with your dominant hand.
Squeeze a small amount of toothpaste on the bristles of your toothbrush.
Brush your teeth with the toothbrush.
Rinse your mouth out with water.
Rinse the bristles of the toothbrush off.
Put your toothbrush and toothpaste away.
